endpoints_implemented: GET /routing/routes - List all static routes and kernel routes
POST /routing/routes - Create a new static route
PUT /routing/routes/:id - Update an existing static route
notes: All endpoints follow the fleet API pattern with Clerk JWT authentication
Mock implementations provided - actual device communication would use RPC
Routing router registered in main index.ts
Routing tag added to OpenAPI schema
Base schemas include staticRoute, policyRoute, routeEntry with proper Zod validation
Database migration for static_routes table will be needed for production
